QuestData.Title: Bloodied Skies
QuestData.Description: We have cannons set up on the top of the towers flanking the main gate. They are our best method to clear the skies when the flying mantid try to pass over the wall, like they are now.$B$BLooks like you're on, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 30 Krik'thik Swarmers using a Setting Sun Turret.
